Welcome to our Listing and thanks for looking!Sorry we are not accepting offers on all our items.Description: Very beautiful diamond cluster ring. Total diamond weight is about 2cts. The diamonds are about SI-I1 clarity. The ring is quite large on top and it is very eye catching. Top measures 25mm by 23.7mm and sits about 14mm above finger. Ring weighs 7.9g of solid 14k WG"Item Specifics" for more detail such as size, weight and measurements etc... Return Policy: Buyers are responsible for shipping and insurance both ways, or pay for return shipping and insurance on items with free shipping. Items must be returned in its original condition. Items have been used, or have done any works, or repairs are not accepted. Original jewelry boxes must be returned with the items (we have buyers returned items without original boxes or without boxes). There will be $5/box taken out from the transaction before making refund if original box is not returned. All our items go out with gift boxes within US. for multiple purchases for International may just come with 1 box for security purposes. Buyers must contact us and let us know when the items being returned and provide tracking numbers and please follow ebay buyer protection policy. Please do not make a purchase if you don't agree. We offer hassle free return policy but you must pay shipping and insurance to ship it back to us. Normal wear and scratches should be expected on the jewelry since we sell estate/pre-own, used jewelry. Please expect up to 5% tolerance for weight and measurements since scale has tolerance and it is hard to measure stones sitting inside the settings. Diamonds quality and color can only be estimated, each of gemologist/jewelers have their own opinions. Please get your proof when opening a case. No question ask if you just want to return it without opening a case. We do eBay business to help supporting our family along with full-time jobs elsewhere, please allow us 24 hours to get back. We are not retailed store that can offer our buyers to try on our jewelry and pay for both ways shipping and insurance. There is risk buying or selling stuff online, we do our best to described our items as much as we can to earn our feedbacks. If you are not willing to take that risk, and expect not to pay for return shipping for unwanted return item, please do not make the purchase. Thank you! Notes: All our jewelry are natural, no treated or enhanced in anyway unless state in the description. Please keep in mind that we sell estate jewelry, that means that they are used in some fashion and being sold as-is. Any known or obvious defect, scratches or problems will be described, if not obvious from the pictures. Pictures are to show detail only and do not represent actual size. All pictures are from actual items. We will endeavor to describe the overall condition of the item but please be aware that normal wears and scatches for the estate jewelry are expected. We guarantee all our diamonds are natural, no treated or enhanced in anyway. All diamond and gold are tested and we only sell solid gold and platinum.
